FuncDef: This command associates an IP filter policy with an ingress or egress Service Access Point (SAP). Filter policies control the forwarding and dropping of packets based on the matching criteria. MAC filters are only allowed on Epipe and Virtual Private LAN Service (VPLS) SAPs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies IP filter policy. The filter ID must already exist within the created IP filters. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the IPv6 filter policy. The filter ID must already exist within the created IPv6 filters. Values-1 to 65535.
